document_title: FortiManager and FortiAnalyzer Persistent XSS vulnerability

note.text: When a low privileged user uploads images in the report section, the filenames are notÂ properly sanitized; this potentially enables stored XSS attacks.
note.title: Summary

note.text: Upgrade to:FortiManager/FortiAnalyzerÂ 5.4.0 and above5.2.6 and above
note.title: Solutions

acknowledgment.description: Fortinet is pleased to thank Vulnerability Lab for reporting a FortiManager/FortiAnalyzer vulnerability under responsible disclosure. Â
